EmailTemplate.name: Hospitality Channel Surveys.Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: Give us your feedback
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your opinion matters. NCR is focused on continuous improvement and enhancing how we support our Channel Partners. As such, we would like to get your feedback on the effectiveness of the information included in the NCR eWeekly newsletter that you currently receive from HospitalityChannelOperations.HSR@ncr.com <[[mailto:HospitalityChannelOperations.HSR@ncr.com]]>.
Please take a few moments to answer the questions in the survey below, which should take less than five minutes of your time. Your response by June 5th, 2020 is greatly appreciated. Thank you for your feedback.
Take our Survey <[[https://forms.office.com/Pages/ResponsePage.aspx?id=9_FNrh5hT0SJfvlk4SBRca0874VxTxJOobnRGlFdzL1UQjFQNlFOM0E1S1NDR09JNUFMWkQxQUZBUC4u]]>
